++ System Development

SD regards [Development] of TheSystem. SD is not limited to a single stage.

++Stages of Development
These are the various areas that require development effort:
    * SystemDesign
    * SystemComponents
    * SystemDatabase
    * SystemInterface

++Methodology
TS has various methodologies to guide its development
    * ThePerfectStart
    * TheDevelopmentModusOperandi determines how architecture will be implemented.
    * TheDevelopmentModusVivendi outlines how developers will function in the project.
